snippet.title: Dead Weight - Official Trailer | Dames 4 Games Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description: Challenge the Ancient Gods! See the battlefields of Dead Weight in this trailer for the upcoming strategy RPG. Set the sails of your flying pirate ship and embark on a roguelite adventure in the steampunk world of Dead Weight. Explore floating islands in search of loot. Choose a class and enjoy turn-based tactical combat on tiny battlefields where every step matters. Dead Weight will be available on PC in 2025.
